Reddit Black Theme [V1.0.2]
data.description: A Black Theme for Reddit. To use this style correctly, enable Reddit's own dark theme! This style currently only supports the redesign of Reddit, but old Reddit support will come later.

user.name: Lekrkoekj

Hi I'm Lekrkoekj! 
I mostly make Dark Themes for a lot of sites on here. If you like any of my styles,  be sure to give feedback on them.

data.name: Jenkins goes dark
Canta Dark for Tweetdeck - 450px-wide columns
data.description:
This is a Canta dark theme for Tweetdeck. It follows Vince Liuice's Canta Dark GTK theme color scheme.

· I fixed column width to 450px. You can revert to default size by adjusting, commenting out or deleting the first rule (html.dark .is-wide-columns .column).
· Scrollbar choice :
styled: keep as is
native: delete both .column-scroller rules
none: uncomment rule 2 and delete rule 3

data.name: Сетка для Игровой
data.description:
Просто сетка для Игровой, сделанная, как отдельная тема, для удобства.
Цвет на выбор: чёрный, белый или серый.
